p: Many natural products exhibit antitumor and related activities and belong to different classes of chemical compounds, such as alkaloids, aromatic and phenolic metabolites, lipids, glycosides, and compounds containing acetylene or epoxy moieties [ 272, 273, 274, 275, 276, 277, 278]. These compounds also refer to various types of terpenoids, including steroids, triterpenoids, carotenoids, and polycyclic endoperoxides.
